page.title: 23Cycling in Milton Keynes
page.content:
Milton Keynes has a system of paths called redways for cyclists. The redways are safer than the roads. The redways are usually of red asphalt and lined with lights. Milton Keynes now has 190km of redways and this is set to increase as Milton Keynes grows. The redways are all signposted allowing easy navigation.

In 2009 the local authority began an improvement program for the existing network. This work will be ongoing and involves things like replacing long lost signs, markings and lighting.
Michael Daniel Moody
